column5: Our charming home with vintage and contemporary collection of art, decor and furniture: Bright and exquisite living area leads to large outdoor entertaining patio. Large formal dining area with beautiful finishes, french doors, stunning antique Persian rugs, Layered frames and mirrors all over the house, incredible master suite and walking closets. Amazing studio with magnificent office furniture. You can find a little bit of old Paris or modern decor that will make so cozy your stay in San Antonio for business or pleasure.
